data.title: Israel’s Media Landscape: Democratic Practice, Constrained Environment
data.meta_description: This chapter presents the evolution of Israel’s media landscape since its inception before the establishment of the state (1948) until the third decade of the twenty-first century. After introducing the pre-state origins of Israel’s media map, which...
